overview: A casting up off of hands ironically employs a composition of renunciation.  "Foregone Conclusion" for the dame the world as butterfly is perceived  "Edit Synch" for the little boy down the land as crystal abstracted  "Concluding Cone" and as rainbow trout for the master pondered.  Hand made sound, hand made and lens-captured images. "Golly, I'm glad I'm not your girlfriend." - Friend of a friend upon viewing TRIPTYCH
title: Triptych
